cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
Beautiful silver 2009 Honda Civic coupe with 105000 miles on it. Very economical with 34 mpg.
Excellent daily driver, this green 2012 Toyota Camry has 72000 miles on it and will last you for years.
This is an immaculate red 2007 Nissan Sentra with only 34000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
Beautiful blue 2010 Honda Civic coupe with 95000 miles on it. Very economical with 34 mpg.
A perennial favorite, this 2012 Toyota Corolla has 69000 miles on it and will last you for years.
